title: Cop Shoots 2-Year-Old Black Baby After Mistaking Pacifier for Gun
subtitle: A 2015 fake news item claiming a Baltimore officer shot and killed toddler Malik Gibson after mistaking a pacifier for a gun resurfaced in July 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Baltimore police officer shot and killed two-year-old Malik Gibson after mistaking his pacifier for a gun.
